test.name: CompatibilityOfP1UseCases.TC.009b
test.description:
Validate "White/Black Lists" Feature in combination with "Unconditional Forwarding" Feature Test Category: SHOULD Test Steps: ---------------------------------------------------------------
1. Recipients in the group enabled "Unconditional Forwarding" feature through Web Portal. 2. Recipients have a White List and Sender is in the White List . 3. Sender send MM1 request to MMS Proxy. 4. MMS Proxy should intercept this message and send "New-Message-Intercepted" Request to Application as HTTP GET Request 5. MMS Extra after validating the sender (in White List) sends a positive response and asks for "send data" to MMS Proxy server. 6. MMS Proxy then sends body with HTTP post request. 7. Sender credit balace has been checked, if the sender has balance then the request get forwarded. 8. Application sends MM via MM7-OUT after changing the recipients headers in the MM Message. 9. Application get a 200 ok response from the recipient. 10. Billing for both sender and recipient happens. ---------------------------------------------------------------
